<style>
.clearfix:after {
    content: "."; 
    display: block; 
    height: 0; 
    clear: both; 
    visibility: hidden;
}

.clearfix {display: inline-block;}

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
* html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
.clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

</style>
<style type="text/css">

.rightthumb {
margin:3px 4px 0px 0px; 
float:left; 
border:0px;
}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">

/***********************************************
* Gradual Highlight image script- © Dynamic Drive DHTML code library (www.dynamicdrive.com)
* This notice MUST stay intact for legal use
* Visit Dynamic Drive at http://www.dynamicdrive.com/ for full source code
***********************************************/

var baseopacity=50

function slowhigh(which2){
imgobj=which2
browserdetect=which2.filters? "ie" : typeof which2.style.MozOpacity=="string"? "mozilla" : ""
instantset(baseopacity)
highlighting=setInterval("gradualfade(imgobj)",50)
}

function slowlow(which2){
cleartimer()
instantset(baseopacity)
}

function instantset(degree){
if (browserdetect=="mozilla")
imgobj.style.MozOpacity=degree/100
else if (browserdetect=="ie")
imgobj.filters.alpha.opacity=degree
}

function cleartimer(){
if (window.highlighting) clearInterval(highlighting)
}

function gradualfade(cur2){
if (browserdetect=="mozilla" && cur2.style.MozOpacity<1)
cur2.style.MozOpacity=Math.min(parseFloat(cur2.style.MozOpacity)+0.1, 0.99)
else if (browserdetect=="ie" && cur2.filters.alpha.opacity<100)
cur2.filters.alpha.opacity+=10
else if (window.highlighting)
clearInterval(highlighting)
}

</script>

<style>
.sideinfo {
border-bottom: 1px dotted #8d8d8d;
font: normal .96em/1.3em arial, helvetica, sans-serif;
color: #8d8d8d;
height:80px;
text-align:left;
}
.sideinfo h2 {
font-size:9pt;
font-weight:bold;
display:inline;
line-height:1.7em;

}
.searchthumb {
width:90px; height:140px; margin:4px;
}
</style>
<script src="/java/uppermenu.js"></script>
</head>

<!-- userbar -->
<script>
function filmtop(char) {
var actioncheck = document.getElementById("fdb");

	if (actioncheck != null) {
	window.frames["fdb"].location.href='/fdb.php?char='+ char;
	} else {
	
		if(char == 9) {
		 window.location.href = '/thefilms';
		} else {
		window.location.href = '/thefilms/'+ char;
		}
	}
	
}
userpic1= new Image(102,22); 
userpic1.src="/images/usr/top-inputbg.png"; 
userpic2= new Image(102,22); 
userpic2.src="/images/usr/top-inputbg-user.png"; 
userpic3= new Image(102,22); 
userpic3.src="/images/usr/top-inputbg-pw.png"; 
</script>

</div><a href="/tags/elephant-man">The Elephant Man</a><br />
<span style="font-size:7pt;">October 3, 1980</span><br /><br />
<span style="color:#6D7D31;">Director:</span> David Lynch<br />
<span style="color:#6D7D31;">Writer:</span> Christopher De Vore, Eric Bergrenl, David Lynch<br />
<span style="color:#6D7D31;">Condensed Cast:</span> Anthony Hopkins,  John Hurt,  Anne Bancroft<br />
<br /><span style="color:#6D7D31; font-size:7pt;">Trailers (1) | Clips (0) | Posters (1)</span></div><div style="width:560px; height:160px; padding:40px 20px 0px 20px; background:url(/images/searchitem.png); text-align:left; margin-bottom:12px;"><div style="float:left; width:104px; position:relative; top:-20px;">

</div><a href="/tags/one-good-man">One Good Man</a><br />
<span style="font-size:7pt;">October 9, 2009</span><br /><br />
<span style="color:#6D7D31;">Director:</span> Christian Vuissa<br />

</script>

</script>
